active.description: false if the user has been deleted

alias.description: An alias displayed to end users

created_at.description: The time the user was created

anyOf.description: A custom role if the user is an agent on the Enterprise plan or above
The id of the user's default group

details.description: Any details you want to store about the user, such as an address

email.description: The user's primary email address. *Writeable on create only. On update, a secondary email is added. See Email Address

external_id.description: A unique identifier from another system. The API treats the id as case insensitive. Example: 'ian1' and 'IAN1' are the same value.

iana_time_zone.description: The time zone for the user

id.description: Automatically assigned when the user is created

anyOf.description: Last time the user signed in to Zendesk Support or made an API request using an API token or basic authentication

locale.description: The user's locale. A BCP-47 compliant tag for the locale. If both 'locale' and 'locale_id' are present on create or update, 'locale_id' is ignored and only 'locale' is used.

moderator.description: Designates whether the user has forum moderation capabilities

notes.description: Any notes you want to store about the user

only_private_comments.description: true if the user can only create private comments

anyOf.description: The id of the user's organization. If the user has more than one organization memberships, the id of the user's default organization. If updating, see Organization ID
The user's primary phone number. See Phone Number below
The user's profile picture represented as an Attachment object

report_csv.description: This parameter is inert and has no effect. It may be deprecated in the future. Previously, this parameter determined whether a user could access a CSV report in a legacy Guide dashboard. This dashboard has been removed. See Announcing Guide legacy reporting upgrade to Explore

restricted_agent.description: If the agent has any restrictions; false for admins and unrestricted agents, true for other agents

role.description: The user's role. Possible values are 'end-user', 'agent', or 'admin'

anyOf.description: The user's role id. 0 for a custom agent, 1 for a light agent, 2 for a chat agent, 3 for a chat agent added to the Support account as a contributor (Chat Phase 4), 4 for an admin, and 5 for a billing admin

shared.description: If the user is shared from a different Zendesk Support instance. Ticket sharing accounts only

shared_agent.description: If the user is a shared agent from a different Zendesk Support instance. Ticket sharing accounts only

anyOf.description: Whether the phone number is shared or not. See Phone Number below

signature.description: The user's signature. Only agents and admins can have signatures

suspended.description: If the agent is suspended. Tickets from suspended users are also suspended, and these users cannot sign in to the end user portal

tags.description: The user's tags. Only present if your account has user tagging enabled

anyOf.description: Specifies which tickets the user has access to. Possible values are: 'organization', 'groups', 'assigned', 'requested', null

time_zone.description: The user's time zone. See Time Zone

anyOf.description: If two factor authentication is enabled

updated_at.description: The time the user was last updated

user_fields.description: Values of custom fields in the user's profile. See User Fields

verified.description: Any of the user's identities is verified. See User Identities
